price: N’iyo Nyagasani wawe aza kubishaka, abantu bose yari kubagira umuryango umwe (bakayoboka idini rimwe rya Isilamu). Ariko bazakomeza kutavuga rumwe (mu madini yabo),
arabic: وَلَوۡ شَآءَ رَبُّكَ لَجَعَلَ ٱلنَّاسَ أُمَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗۖ وَلَا يَزَالُونَ مُخۡتَلِفِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: walaw shāa rabbuka lajaʿala al-nāsa ummatan wāḥidatan walā yazālūna mukh'talifīna
